title: Looking for Mid and Support players to start ranked team
body:
Looking to create a team to play with in ranked,
currently have a silver top laner and myself as Jungle as well as one ADC, no pressure on solo q ranks just come play have fun and grow as a player, message ThreshXG for more info, and please play often :)

replies.body: i main support plat five i play all

I would be interested in having some games with you guys even if its just for fun to start, main support {{champion:432}} {{champion:44}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:223}} {{champion:57}} but recently am finding that i can play decent as a top {{champion:2}} {{champion:245}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:78}} {{champion:57}} and i dont mind playing jg or mid with really any champ... like having fun really.
I'm a top and jungle player but I'm pretty good with zed and yasuo so I can play mid add me if your interested

Yes pls i have no friends on this game. by my friend  <3 I main support. Bronze 4 But I cant get out cause Im a support and its a 50/50 chance im gonna get a terrible adc etc. Cant really carry as a sup all the time. Add me <3 TysonGhee {{champion:412}}

I'm a recently bronze 1 support and i'd be willing to join your team, however i want it made clear that i will sometimes prefer to play with friends and don't want to feel forced into anything i do play this game to have fun.

I wanna join i main ADC but i play every role to a decent level
I would like to try out for Mid. I mainly play{{champion:103}} {{champion:245}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:134}} in the mid lane
